h1. Assembly Match

A class to represent an assembly.  

h2. Version

Available from version 1.4.3

h2. Examples

{code:xml|borderStyle=solid}
<assemblyMatch expr="*.dll" />
{code}


h2. Configuration Elements

|| Element || Description || Type || Required || Default || Version ||
| expr | The name expression of the assembly, e.g. "\*.dll". Masks (? and \*) are allowed.   | String | Yes | _n/a_ | 1.4.3 |
